title: Inside the Parker - Ohtani's Bronx Showcase; 1st Place Asterisks; Bauer Allegations; Bobby Bonilla Day!!
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Ohtani's Bronx Showcase; 1st Place Asterisks; Bauer Allegations; Bobby Bonilla Day!!
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks at Shohei Ohtani going off on the Yanks in the Bronx, the Astros shaking off the haters and leading the AL West, the sexual assault allegations against Dodgers pitcher Trevor Bauer, and the lawsuit filed on behalf of the family of former pitcher Tyler Skaggs over his tragic death. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair.

Guests: MLB Writer Kevin Kiernan discusses Shoei Ohtani's explosion against the Yankees in the Bronx and the Yankees first half struggles. MLBBro.com Reporter Brandon Carr discusses the annual celebration of Bobby Bonilla Day!

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
